|tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid=3Com |default_ssid_regex=^3Com$ |default_ip=192.168.1.250 |default_user= |default_pass=admin |oui=00:1A:C1, 00:1E:C1 |oui_eth=00:1A:C1, 00:1E:C1 }} {{TagLine|'''3Com''' OfficeConnect Wireless 54Mbps11g Access Point}} ('''WL-524''') "WAPA-139G"(...) and "190-C03-06"(...) is silkscreened on a production model board. :The Wi-Fi radio is using a '''Microchip''' ('''SST''') SST12LP14 power amplifier and an '''NEC''' UPG2035 / UPG2035T5F (??) DPDT switch. The power adapter included with the device appears to be a '''3Com''' branded 3C12VUS.. which is a '''DVE''' DSA-15P-12 US 120120 (100-240VAC ~ 50/60Hz, 0.5A -> 12VDC, 1A). ==Serial== ===Pinout=== ===Credentials=== The default login is '''admin:admin'''. ===Info derived from=== {{SCollapse|boot log |

ar531xPlus rev 0x00000087 firmware startup...


Atheros AR5001AP default version 4.0.0.167

ser=9TDR8QK36BF02
start easyconf 08022006
wireless access point starting...
channel 2462
wlan0 Ready
Ready

easyconf: enter while(1)dhcpcBind
}} ====get hardware====

Dec 29 2006, 11:56:16
